<<<<<<< HEAD
The true character of a rigid Presbyter with a narrative of the dangerous designes of the English and Scotish covenanters as they have tended to the ruine of our Church and Kingdom : also the articles of their dogmatic faith and the inconsistency thereof with monarchy : to which is added a short history of the English rebellion / compiled in verse by Marchamont Nedham; and formerly extant in his Mercurius pragmaticus. Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678.
[4], 93 [i.e.83] p.
Printed by the assignes of J. Calvin and are to be sold by Z. Crofton ..., London : 1661.
Numerous errors in paging. "A short history" (p.45-93) has special t.p.; in verse. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
